TopicTitle: Is Kcalbeloh one of the best planet mods?

Articles.Content:
I am playing right now starting in Suluco and the mod is amazing. Even the hot and cold parts of the planets have fog, the illumination, the colours...

The worst part is the distances between the planets but that makes the game more challenging. What do you think?
Kcalbeloh and Whirligig World are great mods.
